column4: AFAICT, Ubuntu packages the entirety of KDE now (at least, my KDE packages all have "ubuntu" in the version)
really! oh well I guess I have no reason not to give ubuntu a proper shot then :)
I have a ubuntu warty cd that I got a couple of months ago, is it still as uptodate as any iso I can download now?
indeed :) However, the menu structure is somewhat offensive (rather Windows-like), but that may be unintentional.
